title: 2008 World Masters Athletics Indoor Championships
text:
2008 World Masters Athletics Indoor Championships is the third in a series of <a href="World%20Masters%20Athletics%20Championships%23Indoor%20Championships">World Masters Athletics Indoor Championships</a> (also called World Masters Athletics Championships Indoor, or WMACi). This third edition took place in <a href="Clermont-Ferrand">Clermont-Ferrand</a>, <a href="France">France</a>, from March 17 to 22, 2008.
The main venue was <a href="Jean-Pellez%20Stadium">Jean-Pellez Stadium</a>,
which has a <a href="banked%20turn">banked</a> indoor track where the turns are raised
to neutralize the <a href="centrifugal%20force">centrifugal force</a> of athletes running the curves.
This Championships was organized by <a href="World%20Masters%20Athletics">World Masters Athletics</a> (WMA) in coordination with a Local Organising Committee (LOC): Annie Laurent, Jean Gracia.
The WMA is the global governing body of the sport of <a href="athletics%20%28sport%29">athletics</a> for athletes 35 years of age or older, setting rules for <a href="masters%20athletics">masters athletics</a> competition.
A full range of <a href="Track%20and%20field%23Indoor">indoor track and field</a> events were held.
In addition to indoor competition, non-stadia events included <a href="Half%20Marathon">Half Marathon</a>,
<a href="Cross%20country%20running">8K Cross Country</a>,
<a href="10%20kilometres%20race%20walk">10K Race Walk</a>, <a href="Hammer%20Throw">Hammer Throw</a>, <a href="Discus%20Throw">Discus Throw</a> and <a href="Javelin%20Throw">Javelin Throw</a>.
Results.
Official results are partially archived at Masters2008.
Past Championships results are archived at WMA.
Additional archives are available from <a href="European%20Masters%20Athletics">European Masters Athletics</a>
as a <a href="pdf">searchable pdf</a>,
from <a href="British%20Masters%20Athletic%20Federation">British Masters Athletic Federation</a>
as a <a href="pdf">searchable pdf</a>,
and from Masters Athletics
as a <a href="pdf">searchable pdf</a>.
<a href="USATF%20Masters%20Indoor%20Championships">USATF Masters</a> keeps a list of American world record holders.
Medal counts and other summaries are archived at the Clermont2008
and Masters2008 sites.
Several <a href="List%20of%20world%20records%20in%20masters%20athletics">masters world records</a> were set at this Indoor Championships. World records for 2008 are from WMA unless otherwise noted.
